DocAttribute.Name: PredefinedType
DocAttribute.Documentation:
Predefined generic type for a building element proxy that is specified in an enumeration. There may be a property set given specificly for the predefined types. > NOTE  The _PredefinedType_ shall only be used, if no _IfcBuildingElementProxyType_ is assigned, providing its own _IfcBuildingElementProxyType.PredefinedType_.
{ .change-ifc2x4} > IFC4 CHANGE  The attribute _CompositionType_ has been replaced by _PredefinedType_, being a superset of the enumerators.

DocWhereRule.Name: HasObjectName
DocWhereRule.Documentation: A Name attribute should be asserted for a building element proxy.

DocWhereRule.Name: CorrectPredefinedType
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Either the _PredefinedType_ attribute is unset (e.g. because an _IfcBuildingElementProxyType_ is associated), or the inherited attribute _ObjectType_ shall be provided, if the _PredefinedType_ is set to USERDEFINED.

DocWhereRule.Name: CorrectTypeAssigned
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Either there is no building element proxy type object associated, i.e. the _IsTypedBy_ inverse relationship is not provided, or the associated type object has to be of type _IfcBuildingElementProxyType_.
